text: Antonella Lualdi (6 July 1931 - 10 August 2023) was an Italian actress and singer. She appeared in many Italian and French movies in the 1950s and 1960s, notably in Claude Autant-Lara's movie Le rouge et le noir in 1954, opposite GÃ©rard Philipe. Lualdi died on 10 August 2023 in Rome, Italy at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1931 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian singers Category:People from Beirut
title: Antonella Lualdi
